mapper.insert: INSERT INTO special_break (specialId, empName, empBirth, empNo, position, department, startDate, endDate, useDays, type, reason, approval, status ) VALUES (#{specialId}, #{empName}, #{empBirth}, #{empNo}, #{position}, #{department}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{useDays}, #{type}, #{reason}, #{approval}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT empId, empName, DATE_FORMAT(empBirth, '%Y-%m-%d') as empBirth, empNo, position, email, phoneNumber, emerNumber, bankName, accountNumber, department, DATE_FORMAT(hireDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as hireDate, status, role, totalDays FROM employee WHERE empNo = #{empNo}
